'''Toy Blocks''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Broken Sea]], [[Simulanka]]. With this mechanic, the player must piece together various toy blocks in some expected format. The format may be based on placing blocks of similar colors together, matching some expected shape (such as a toy house) nearby, or other criteria.
